overview: Filmed live at Vicar Street Theatre, this one-off show is a mix of Jason’s record breaking Edinburgh Festival set alongside some brand-new-to-DVD material including his famous quickly, quickly, quickly request from the wife! Even members of the audience aren’t safe as Jason shows off some magic, teaches the Riverdance and exposes a couple in the audience who are having an affair.
title: Jason Byrne: The Byrne Identity
